content.rendered:
[vc_section el_class=”mainBorderImg”][vc_row el_class=”about-section innerpage package-page sPackagesStyle” css=”.vc_custom_1622047152334{margin-top: -10px !important;}” el_id=”ServiceSeeker”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”row packages-row”]

SERVICE SEEKER

Need a trusted partner with strong fundamentals to own multiple operational touchpoints

  1. Helping you focus on your own core business operations
  2. Seeks a reliable partner with requisite subject matter expertise
  3. Needs a wide range of services at best commercials
  4. Corporate assurance on effective service delivery

Sign Up Now View Package[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”image wow fadeInRight”][vc_single_image image=”270″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ onclick=”zoom”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”about-section innerpage package-page sPackagesStyle” css=”.vc_custom_1622047169322{margin-top: -10px !important;}” el_id=”serviceConsultant”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”273″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”image wow fadeInRight”][vc_column_text el_class=”row packages-row”]

CONSULTANT

A subject matter expert, governance mentor serving as a link between service seeker & service provider.

  1. Verified and trustworthy subject matter expert of respective domain
  2. Bridge between service seeker and service provider
  3. Ensures successful project allocation, governance and delivery

Sign Up Now View Package[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”about-section innerpage package-page sPackagesStyle” css=”.vc_custom_1622047193188{margin-top: -10px !important;}” el_id=”serviceProvider”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”row packages-row”]

SERVICE PROVIDER

Need a trusted partner with strong fundamentals to bring growth & efficiency in the business.

  1. Sitting on idle capacity
  2. Needs immediate qualified leads commensurate to the size of the business
  3. Presently struggling with the high cost of qualified lead generation
  4. A corporate assurance on payments

Sign Up Now View Package[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”image wow fadeInRight”][vc_single_image image=”274″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
